sentences.en: " And a sombre, but yet a studied magnificence. "
sentences.cn: 显示出一种阴沉而又做作的壮丽.

sentences.en: Accordingly, the crowd was sombre and grave.
sentences.cn: 因之, 人群也显出相应的阴郁和庄重.

sentences.en: dressed in sombre shades of grey and black
sentences.cn: 穿着灰色和黑色的暗色调衣服

sentences.en: He likes sombre, muted colours — she likes bright colours.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢暗淡、柔和的颜色；而她喜欢明艳的颜色。
他突然看起来很阴郁，一副忧虑的样子。
他的表情变得越来越严肃。

sentences.en: His face made him very sombre.
sentences.cn: 他的脸色变得十分严峻.

sentences.en: It was a beautiful house, but it was dark and sombre and dead.
sentences.cn: 这座房子虽然很漂亮，但是色彩暗淡，死气沉沉。

sentences.en: on the sombre occasion of his mother’s funeral
sentences.cn: 在他母亲葬礼的那种严肃场合

sentences.en: The colour of these objects was chiefly pale or sombre.
sentences.cn: 这些东西的色彩主要是黯淡,或者说灰暗.

sentences.en: The day was chill and sombre.
The pair were in sombre mood.

sentences.cn: 他们闷闷不乐地坐着，一声不吭。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, this happy story finishes on a more sombre note.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，这个快乐的故事结局却比较伤感。

sentences.en: We were all in a somber mood that night.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上我们所有人都心情沉重。

sentences.en: We were at a sombre little party that evening.
When we met in the street the houses had grown sombre.
sentences.cn: 当我们在街头聚会的时候,房屋早已沉浸在昏暗中了.

sentences.en: When we played in the street the houses had grown sombre.
sentences.cn: 当我们在街上玩耍时,一幢幢房屋变得阴森森的.
